name: Probopass
author: Kent Kanetsuna
flavor_text: It exudes strong magnetism from all over. It controls three small units call Mini-Noses.

poke_body.name: Steel Coating
poke_body.effect: Any damage done to Probopass by your opponent’s attacks is reduced by 10 for each {M} Energy attached to Probopass (after applying Weakness and Resistance). You can’t reduce more than 20 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Metal Bomber
attacks.effect: Choose a number of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon up to the amount of {M} Energy attached to Probopass. This attack does 20 damage to each of them. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
